alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 1:13PM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, moderate at times. Storm total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the mountain-valleys with 5 to 10 inches possible in the mountains above 7000 ft MSL. North winds increasing and gusting as high as 30 mph tonight resulting in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Idaho mountains. * WHEN...continuing until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions and potential travel delays.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
